body.p: To configure XSD preferences, and go to Editor Content Completion XSD . The options in this preferences page define what elements are suggested by the Content Completion Assistant, in addition to the ones from the XML Schema (defined by the xs:annotation/xs:appinfo elements).

ul.li: None - the Content Completion Assistant offers only the XML Schema schema information;
Other - the Content Completion Assistant includes in xs:appinfo elements from an XML Schema identified by an URL.
